name: Cold Chicken Quinoa Avocado Salad
author: Sroch
summary: This is a summer-favorite of my family. It has a great fresh flavor and is so easy for a weeknight meal. The avocado is a fun alternative to a mayo dressing. Serve alone, on top of lettuce, or in a whole wheat pita.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring water and quinoa to a boil in a saucepan
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until quinoa is tender and water has been absorbed, 15 to 20 minutes
Cool quinoa to room temperature, about 30 minutes
Mix mashed avocado, cilantro, lime juice, salt, and pepper together in a bowl until dressing is smooth
Combine quinoa, chicken, tomatoes, and scallions in a bowl; add avocado dressing and toss to coat
